title: IThreadFeatureData.MirrorProfile
description: Gets or sets whether to flip the profile of the thread helix about its horizontal or vertical axis in this thread feature.
returns: True to flip the profile of the thread helix about its horizontal or vertical axis, false to not (default)
remarks:
If this property is set to true, use
IThreadFeatureData::MirrorType
to specify the axis about which to flip the thread helix profile.
